column1: Specification ParameterBid Requirement (Allowed Values)NameThe item to be packed in Reams of 500 Sheets each with a moisture proofpolylaminated blue & white colored cover paper as per the approved design.The GSM of the cover paper shall be 120 (min.). 10 such ream packets shallPackingthen be packed in a strong blue coloured 5 ply corrugated box of not lessthan 650 GSM & having Bursting Strength of 9 (min). Thereafter, thecorrugated boxes shall be closed properly with crosswise strapping by PVCtapes to make a strong and composite pack.Each Ream Packet shall be ISI Marked and ECO marked . The word“Government of India”, Govt. Arrow Mark, the description of the plain copierMarkingpaper, name of the manufacturer, quantity of contents and month & year ofmanufacture shall appear on each corrugated boxes.

column3: The item to be packed in Reams of 500 Sheets each with a moisture proofpolylaminated blue & white colored cover paper as per the approved design.The GSM of the cover paper shall be 120 (min.). 10 such ream packets shallthen be packed in a strong blue coloured 5 ply corrugated box of not lessthan 650 GSM & having Bursting Strength of 9 (min). Thereafter, thecorrugated boxes shall be closed properly with crosswise strapping by PVCtapes to make a strong and composite pack.

Each Ream Packet shall be ISI Marked and ECO marked . The word“Government of India”, Govt. Arrow Mark, the description of the plain copierpaper, name of the manufacturer, quantity of contents and month & year ofmanufacture shall appear on each corrugated boxes.
